title: BC报错
author: hyzgzz
txt_content:
Task BungeeTask(sched=net.md_5.bungee.scheduler.BungeeScheduler@20140db9, id=12, owner=com.minecraftdimensions.bungeesuite.BungeeSuite@6404f418, task=com.minecraftdimensions.bungeesuite.listeners.PlayerListener$1@a01ab13, delay=10000, period=0, running=true) encountered an exception
java.lang.NullPointerException
    at com.minecraftdimensions.bungeesuite.listeners.PlayerListener$1.run(PlayerListener.java:51)
    at net.md_5.bungee.scheduler.BungeeTask.run(BungeeTask.java:63)
    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
    at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: Mr_robbit
replies.txt_content: 备份然后删除 BC 的 config 文件，看看问题是不是出在配置文件上，检查拼写。如果不是就删除 BC 插件，看看还会不会有报错。两种方式都不可行的话，建议升级至最新版BC
